%% Auto-generated topology diagram, any manual modifications will be lost during regeneration.
%%{Groupware_WikiPage} }%%
graph LR
	classDef ez4Api fill:#196ee650, stroke:#196ee6a0;
	classDef ez4ApiImport fill:#196ee625, stroke:#196ee6a0, stroke-dasharray:5 5;
	classDef ez4ApiEdge stroke:#196ee6
	subgraph APIs
		style APIs fill: #f5f5f5, stroke-width: 0
		Api@{Groupware_WikiPage}
		class Api ez4Api
	end
	classDef ez4Scheduler fill:#9b51e050, stroke:#9b51e0a0;
	classDef ez4SchedulerEdge stroke:#9b51e0
	classDef ez4SchedulerEdge stroke:#9b51e0;
	subgraph Schedulers
		style Schedulers fill: #f5f5f5, stroke-width: 0
		EventScheduler@{Groupware_ChatRoom}
		class EventScheduler ez4Scheduler
	end
	classDef ez4Database fill:#eb575750, stroke:#eb5757a0;
	classDef ez4DatabaseEdge stroke:#eb5757;
	subgraph DBs
		style DBs fill: #f5f5f5, stroke-width: 0
		EventDb@{Groupware_WikiPage}
		class EventDb ez4Database
	end
	StatsServiceFactory --> EventDb
	Api DateValidationApi@--> DateValidation
	Api StatsServiceFactoryApi@--> StatsServiceFactory
	Api EventSchedulerApi@--> EventScheduler
	Api EventDbApi@--> EventDb
	Api DateValidationApi@--> DateValidation
	EventScheduler EventDbEventScheduler@--> EventDb
	DateValidation --> EventDb
	class DateValidationApi ez4ApiEdge
	class StatsServiceFactoryApi ez4ApiEdge
	class EventSchedulerApi ez4ApiEdge
	class EventDbApi ez4ApiEdge
	class DateValidationApi ez4ApiEdge
	class EventDbEventScheduler ez4SchedulerEdge
